snippet: Asia’s economic endurance has helped offset weakness in the United States and Europe, but recent gains have been smaller than expected.
abstract: Stocks fall as evidence piles up that the global economic slowdown is hurting Asia.
lead_paragraph: Asia’s economic endurance has helped offset weakness in the United States and Europe, but recent gains have been smaller than expected.

headline.seo: Slower Growth in Asia Brings Down Stocks
headline.main: Slower Growth in Asia Drags Down Markets
headline.print_headline: Slower Growth in Asia Drags Down Markets
